roleset.name: shining a light on, clarification
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, illuminate.01. Corresponds to VNcls illustrate-25.3.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Anyway , just now went to the car and discovered that one of the external door illumination light is not working .

example.name: arg1
example.text: -LRB- Constant ILLUMINATION of materialistic things - hence the looting .
